sentences.en: A diet deficient in vitamin D may cause the disease rickets.
sentences.cn: 缺少维生素D的饮食可能导致软骨病.

sentences.en: a diet that is deficient in vitamin A
Cottonseed meal is deficient in lysine, methionine and leucine.
sentences.cn: ?澍宸廴狈?蛋彼幔0蛋氨酸和亮氨酸.

sentences.en: Exotics are most useful in regions in which the native flora is deficient.
sentences.cn: 在当地植物种类贫乏的地区,外来种最为有用.

sentences.en: I always have been deficient in selfconfidence and decision.
sentences.cn: 我向来缺乏自信和果断.

sentences.en: In a solid which is moderately low in available zinc, deep cuts may expose zinc - deficient subsoils.
sentences.cn: 土壤中含有效锌转低时, 深层耕翻会使缺锌的底土暴露出来.

sentences.en: In aprotic acids, it is some other electron - deficient element.
sentences.cn: 在无质子的酸中, 它是另一种缺电子元素.

sentences.en: It only shows her being deficient in something herself - sense or feeling.
sentences.cn: 那只不过说明了她本身有什么缺陷,不是见识方面有缺陷,就是感觉方面有缺陷.

sentences.en: Oceanic islands are sometimes deficient in animals of certain whole classes.
sentences.cn: 海洋岛屿上有时缺少某整纲所有的动物.

sentences.en: The crops are suffering from deficient rain.
sentences.cn: 庄稼因雨量不足而遭受损害.

sentences.en: The milk is deficient in fat.
When molybdenum is deficient, nitrate may accumulate to a toxic level in the plant.
sentences.cn: 当钼不足时, 硝酸盐会积累在植物中达到毒害的程度.

sentences.en: When wheat plants allowed to become deficient in potassium, pyruvate kinase activity increased.
sentences.cn: 当小麦植株令其缺钾时, 丙酮酸激酶活性随之升高.

sentences.en: Women who are dieting can become iron deficient.
sentences.cn: 节食的女性有可能缺铁。

words.tran_cn: 缺陷，缺点；缺乏；不足的数额

trans.tran_cn: 不足的，缺乏的，有缺陷的
trans.tran_en: not containing or having enough of something
